question: You have recently landed in a foreign country on a work visa and need information about the place in and around the city. Write a letter to the relocation assistance provider seeking help and in your letter,Write why you are writing the letterWhat kind of information you wantHow and by when you can get the requested information
text: I am writing this letter to gain some information about my new workplace which is in the city circle.

The city of Toronto is big, since this is the first time I have been here, it has been very difficult for me to find my new workplace. Unfortunately, today morning I  accidentally deleted the address of the office building. I would be glad if could help me to locate my office.

While I am not completely sure how I deleted my office address, I believe my phone might have some issues. In fact, I have been trying to contact one of my colleagues since this morning but he has not answered my phone yet. Therefore, it would be great if you help me find my office which name is OASIS soft tech.

While your office is situated in the city, you would probably know the name of this company that I am going to work for. Based on the map location, it must be somewhere near your head office. Thus, If you are able to find it, could you please leave a message or give me a call on 0426970026 by tomorrow morning.
Please let me know if you need any kind of relevant information.
